question: How do I reset my password?
answer: You can reset your password by going to Settings, selecting 'Reset Password', and following the instructions sent to your registered email address.

question: I forgot my password. What should I do?
answer: If you forgot your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password' to receive a password reset link.

question: How can I change my email address?
answer: You can change your email address from your account settings page. After updating, you may be asked to verify the new email.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer refunds within 30 days of purchase, provided the service has not been extensively used.

question: How long does it take to receive a refund?
answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5 to 7 business days after approval.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact customer support through the chat option on our website or by emailing support@example.com.

question: Why am I unable to log in to my account?
answer: Login issues can occur due to incorrect credentials, a locked account, or temporary system issues. Try resetting your password or contact support if the issue persists.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: To update your payment method, go to Billing in your account settings and add or edit your payment details.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, all payment information is securely encrypted and processed through trusted payment gateways.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: You can cancel your subscription from the subscription section in your account settings. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your billing cycle.

question: Will I be charged after cancelling my subscription?
answer: No, once your subscription is cancelled, you will not be charged again. You will continue to have access until the end of the current billing period.

question: Why is my account suspended?
answer: Accounts may be suspended due to policy violations, suspicious activity, or billing issues. Please contact customer support for more details.

question: How do I reactivate my suspended account?
answer: To reactivate a suspended account, please contact customer support so they can review your case and assist you further.

question: What browsers are supported?
answer: Our platform supports the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

question: How do I delete my account permanently?
answer: To permanently delete your account, go to account settings and select 'Delete Account'. Please note that this action is irreversible.
